derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, via Latin from Greek purakantha, the name of an unidentified plant, from pur 'fire' + akantha 'thorn'

means.word_mean: 1. any of various thorny shrubs of the genus Pyracantha bearing small white flowers followed by hard red or orange-red berries
